oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Primm Springs Hotel
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: People in front of the Primm Springs Hotel.

Primm Springs has natural mineral springs that were once thought to be a source of healing. Hotels were built at the resort and there was even a dance hall (some of these buildings are still standing). It became a favorite Summer retreat for some of the well known citizens of Columbia in the latter half of the 1800�s. Columbia�s famed Silver Helicon Band played there as well.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Porches; Hotels; Buildings
